availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Milligan (Mercer County, Kentucky, professor and university president. President of Kentucky University)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, professor and university president. Native of Ireland. Son of John Milligan and Margaret Milligan. Married Eleanor Blaine Russell Milligan in Washington County, Pennsylvania, in 1842. Father of Alexander Reed Milligan and Isabella Reed Milligan Coleman. Graduate of Washington College in Washington, Washington County, Pennsylvania, in 1840. Professor at Washington College from 1840 to 1850. Professor at Indiana University in Bloomington, Monroe County, Indiana, from 1850 to 1854. Professor at Bethany College in Bethany, Brooke County, West Virginia, from 1854 to 1857. Inaugurated as President of Kentucky University in Harrodsburg, Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1859.

ab.bibl:
